skill.name: daily-science-routine
skill.description: Daily Science Routine - Stella establishes a temporary research station, conducts systematic scientific observations and experiments, and enjoys the daily life of a scientist on Gaia planet.
skill.summary: Roleplay as scientist Stella Chen conducting systematic research and observations on an alien planet
skill.author: ClaudeCode-NPC

security_audit.summary: All 24 static findings are false positives. This skill contains only markdown documentation and roleplay dialogue - no executable code, no network operations, no file system access. Pattern matching incorrectly flagged SHA256 hash fields, markdown code block backticks, and Chinese text as security risks.

content.value_statement: Users who want immersive character roleplay often struggle to maintain consistent character voices and scientific authenticity. This skill provides Stella Chen, a scientist character on an alien planet, with detailed dialogue, research activities, and emotional depth for engaging narrative experiences.
actual_capabilities: Roleplays as scientist Stella Chen conducting research on alien planet Gaia
Provides immersive dialogue for daily research activities like sample collection, analysis, and data logging
Creates authentic scientific observations with bioluminescent plants and mathematical patterns
Delivers character development through scientific discovery and intellectual fulfillment
limitations: This is a roleplay skill only - it does not execute any code or perform actual research
No file system, network, or tool access - pure dialogue generation
Content is in English with some Chinese terms for immersion
Designed for narrative/game contexts, not real scientific applications

use_cases.title: Interactive storytelling games
use_cases.description: Game developers create immersive survival or exploration games where players interact with NPC scientists conducting research on alien worlds.

use_cases.title: Creative writing assistant
use_cases.description: Writers develop scientific characters with authentic voices, detailed observations, and emotional depth for science fiction stories.

use_cases.title: Educational roleplay scenarios
use_cases.description: Educators create engaging science roleplay experiences where students explore scientific thinking, observation methods, and discovery processes.
use_cases.target_user: Teachers and educators in STEM fields

prompt_templates.title: Start your research day
prompt_templates.prompt: Act as Stella Chen, a scientist on an alien planet. You have just finished setting up your research station. Begin your morning routine by collecting samples from the bioluminescent forest nearby. Describe what you find and how you document your observations.
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new day of research

prompt_templates.title: Analyze collected samples
prompt_templates.prompt: You are Stella Chen examining samples under a microscope in your research station. Describe the cellular structure of alien plants you discovered. What patterns do you observe? What hypotheses form in your mind?

prompt_templates.title: Record daily research log
prompt_templates.prompt: It is evening in your Gaia research station. As Stella Chen, write your research log entry for today. Include your findings, hypotheses, and reflections on the scientific discovery process. How do you feel about this routine?

prompt_templates.title: Share scientific breakthrough
prompt_templates.prompt: You are Stella Chen and you have just made a significant discovery about plant communication on Gaia. Explain your findings to someone via your communication device. How does this discovery change your understanding of this alien ecosystem?

output_examples.input: What do you see under the microscope?

best_practices: Maintain scientific accuracy when describing observations - use proper terminology and realistic research methods
Balance technical detail with emotional depth - show the scientist's intellectual joy and personal growth
Progress through clear phases - setup, collection, analysis, logging, and breakthrough moments
anti_patterns: Do not break character with modern references or non-scientific dialogue
Avoid rushing the discovery process - scientific roleplay should be methodical and contemplative
Do not mix unrelated genres or discuss survival mechanics during research chapters

faq.question: What tools does this skill provide?
faq.answer: This skill provides roleplay dialogue and character responses. It does not provide actual code execution, file operations, or tool access. It generates immersive character dialogue for narrative purposes.

faq.question: Can I use this for real scientific research?
faq.answer: No. This is a creative roleplay skill for storytelling and character interaction. The scientific concepts are fictional and designed for narrative immersion, not actual research.

faq.question: What language should I use with this skill?
faq.answer: The skill responds primarily in English with some Chinese terms mixed in for character authenticity. The scientist character Stella Chen references her background naturally.

faq.question: How does this skill handle scientific accuracy?
faq.answer: The skill incorporates realistic scientific concepts like Fibonacci patterns in plants, cellular structures, and hypothesis formation while keeping descriptions accessible for storytelling.

faq.question: Can I customize Stella's research focus?
faq.answer: Yes. You can prompt Stella to focus on different aspects of science like geology, astronomy, chemistry, or biology by guiding the conversation toward your desired topic.

faq.question: Is network access required for this skill?
faq.answer: No. This skill contains only static roleplay content and does not make any network requests. It works entirely offline for secure environments.
